original_text: What value does an idol have? What help can it give? Somebody has made it as the image of a false god. It can only tell false messages. Why should its maker trust it for help? He has used wood or metal to make it and it cannot speak! What value does an idol have? What help can it give? Somebody has made it as the image of a false god. It can only tell false messages. Why should its maker trust it for help? He has used wood or metal to make it and it cannot speak!
korean_text: 새긴 우상은 그 새겨 만든 자에게 무엇이 유익하겠느냐 부어 만든 우상은 거짓 스승이라 만든 자가 이 말하지 못하는 우상을 의지하니 무엇이 유익하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: What value does an idol have?

sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 무슨 도움을 줄 수 있겠는가?

sentences.original_text: as the image of a false god.
It can only tell false messages.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 거짓 메시지만 전할 수 있다

sentences.original_text: Why should its maker trust it for help?
sentences.korean_translation: 어째서 그 만든 자가 도움을 위해 그것을 믿어야 하는가?

sentences.original_text: He has used wood or metal to make it
